headline: Halliburton Announces Dual Listing on NYSE Texas
summary: HOUSTON, May 28, 2025--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) announced today the dual listing of its common stock on NYSE Texas, the newly launched fully electronic equities exchange headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
